title: Do you think that the battle between AMD and Intel will increase in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it will - and I also think it is a good thing. Competition - as long as it follows basic rules - benefits with customers and in our case - with the technology. Historically when Intel had full control over the PC market without any clear competition it was “falling asleep”. The rivalry between AMD and Intel that taking place during the last 2 years have huge benefits with the customers - getting more products at lower prices. Within the 2 companies it drivers toward more aggressive executions, better innovation and new concepts.

You mean competition, right, rather than actual armed conflict? Competition is always good. It’s what made AMD improve its products. It’s what makes AMD and Nvidia work to improve their respective products. Intel has gotten fat and lazy (think Rocky III before he got a whuppin’ from Clubber Lang).
It’s not a battle. It’s a massacre, unless Intel finally comes out with something comparable to Ryzen offerings while keeping to the same price brackets.
